sentences.sentence: His mother always takes his part.
His only weakness is his temperament.
sentences.translation: 他惟一的弱点是他的脾气。

sentences.sentence: No one doubted his ability, his industry or his integrity.
sentences.translation: 没有人怀疑他的能力、勤奋和正直。
